name: One Pot Chicken Dish
ingredients: 1 pound chicken tenders or boneless breasts cut into strips

instructions.en: Fry bacon until crisp. Remove bacon, keep 3 tablespoons grease in skillet.
Season chicken with seasoning salt. Cook in skillet until barely done. Remove and keep warm.
Cook onions and pepper in skillet for about 3 minutes until soft.
Add garlic and mushrooms. Cook 3-4 minutes until mushrooms are tender.
Add broth and bring to a boil.
Return chicken to pan and heat through. Thicken sauce with xanthan gum if desired.
Add bacon and green onions. Season with salt if necessary. Garnish with parsley if using.

notes: Makes 4 servings. Do not freeze. Prep all ingredients before starting to cook. You can use any seasoning salt you like instead of Spicy Seasoning Salt.
